testsuite.name: login.LoginFieldsTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_usernamePasswordFieldsHeight Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Login screen Username and Password fields height" Username field width is <b>501 Password field width is <b>501 Username and Password fields height are same TC_usernamePasswordFieldsHeight Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_validUsernameEmptyPassword Testcase execution Started "This method verifies authentication for valid username and empty password" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Username field Performed click action on Password field Entered text "" in the Password field Invalid credentials error message is displayed TC_validUsernameEmptyPassword Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_emptyUsernameValidPassword Testcase execution Started "This method verifies authentication for empty username and valid password" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "" in the Username field Performed click action on Password field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Password field Invalid credentials error message is displayed TC_emptyUsernameValidPassword Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_invalidUsernameValidPassword Testcase execution Started "This method verifies authentication for invalid username and valid password" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "CROv" in the Username field Performed click action on Password field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Password field Invalid credentials error message is displayed TC_invalidUsernameValidPassword Testcase execution Completed

Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_usernamePasswordFieldsWidth Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Login screen Username and Password fields Width" Username field width is <b>501 Password field width is <b>501 Username and Password fields width are same TC_usernamePasswordFieldsWidth Testcase execution Completed

Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_usernamePasswordFieldAlignment Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Login screen Username and Password fields alignment" Username field Y-Coordinate is <b>133 Password field Y-Coordinate is <b>133 Username and Password Y-coordinates are identical TC_usernamePasswordFieldAlignment Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_validUsernameInvalidPassword Testcase execution Started "This method verifies authentication for valid username and invalid password" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "InfoAdmin" in the Username field Performed click action on Password field Entered text "aHCdrB" in the Password field Invalid credentials error message is displayed TC_validUsernameInvalidPassword Testcase execution Completed
